mapper.select: select knowledgeManageId, knowledgeManageName, url, knowledgeCategoryName, knowledgeIntroduction, knowledgeContent, knowledgeManagement.createTime, knowledgeManagement.createUser from knowledgeManagement left join file on file.connectId=knowledgeManagement.knowledgeManageId where knowledgeManagement.knowledgeManageId=#{knowledgeManageId} and file.fileType=#{fileType}
